alert.note: Alert for Creek; Rogers; Tulsa; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:39AM CDT until August 05 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Tulsa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 739 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located 2 miles northeast of Turley, 4 miles northeast of Sand Springs and 4 miles south of Tulsa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Sand Springs... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Glenpool... Coweta... Catoosa... Verdigris... Jenks Riverside Airport... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... Oneta... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 211 and 245. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
